statements: SELECT * FROM online_activities;
SELECT username, email FROM online_activities;
SELECT person_id, username, birthdate FROM online_activities WHERE email='test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM online_activities ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT person_id, email FROM online_activities WHERE birthdate='2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM online_activities WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT person_id, username FROM online_activities WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM online_activities WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_users FROM online_activities WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT person_id, email FROM online_activities WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM VictimInfo;
SELECT id, name, address FROM VictimInfo WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM VictimInfo WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM OnlineActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT victim_id, activity_type FROM OnlineActivities WHERE activity_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VictimInfo WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM VictimInfo WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM OnlineActivities WHERE activity_type = 'browsing' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM VictimInfo WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM VictimInfo WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Victims;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Victims;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM OnlineActivities WHERE victim_id = 1;
SELECT victim_id, name, address FROM Victims ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheft WHERE method_used = 'Phishing' ORDER BY date_of_theft DESC;
SELECT * FROM Victims;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Victims WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT victim_id, name, email, phone_number FROM Victims ORDER BY victim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM OnlineActivities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%fraud%';

SELECT Victims.name, OnlineActivities.activity_type, IdentityTheft.date_of_theft FROM Victims JOIN OnlineActivities ON Victims.victim_id = OnlineActivities.victim_id JOIN IdentityTheft ON Victims.victim_id = IdentityTheft.victim_id WHERE IdentityTheft.method_used = 'phishing';
SELECT * FROM Victims;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Victims WHERE victim_id = 1;
SELECT victim_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Victims ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT * FROM OnlineActivities WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT information_id, address, date_of_birth FROM PersonalInformation WHERE victim_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Victims INNER JOIN OnlineActivities ON Victims.victim_id = OnlineActivities.victim_id
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Victims INNER JOIN PersonalInformation ON Victims.victim_id = PersonalInformation.victim_id
SELECT email, date_of_birth, theft_description FROM Victims INNER JOIN IdentityTheft ON Victims.victim_id = IdentityTheft.victim_id
SELECT * FROM PersonalInformation WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT first_name, last_name, activity_timestamp FROM Victims INNER JOIN OnlineActivities ON Victims.victim_id = OnlineActivities.victim_id ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM online_activities;
SELECT victim_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM online_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM personal_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT method_name, success_rate FROM identity_theft_methods WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT victim_id, date_of_theft, description FROM identity_theft_logs WHERE victim_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM online_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM personal_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT method_name, success_rate FROM identity_theft_methods WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY method_name ASC;

SELECT p.full_name, l.date_of_theft, r.report_description FROM personal_information p JOIN identity_theft_logs l ON p.victim_id = l.victim_id JOIN theft_reports r ON p.victim_id = r.victim_id WHERE l.date_of_theft BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_victims FROM identity_theft_logs GROUP BY method_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY total_victims DESC;
